markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 3"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Feather Step Stone](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2976)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=564" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=644" />
<trait label="Talisman" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=709" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 264 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 8 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** affixed to armor

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Free Action" /><row>([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32))</row></row>

 

**Trigger** You Stride or Step

**Requirement** You are trained in Acrobatics
</row>

</column>

---

This stone, usually shaped as a cabochon, is a small chunk of amber with a bit of feather or a flying insect caught within it. When you activate the stone, you ignore the effects of any difficult terrain and greater difficult terrain you move through until the end of your turn.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Feather Step Stone
